forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 85, with temperatures falling to around 76 in the afternoon. West wind around 24 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Patchy Frost
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 8pm, then patchy frost. Partly cloudy. Low around 36, with temperatures rising to around 38 overnight. North northwest wind 6 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 36 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
